snippet: Letters and online comments on the loss of handwriting in schools, a breast cancer survivor’s saving ink and an observatory’s adoring public.
lead_paragraph: Letters and online comments on the loss of handwriting in schools, a breast cancer survivor’s saving ink and an observatory’s adoring public.

headline.main: Handwriting Loses Ground, Healing Tattoos, Telescopic Legacies
